Package ohos.aafwk.ability.fraction

Provides Fraction-related capabilities.

A Fraction can be placed in a container (an Ability) as a part of its UI and cannot be used independently. A Fraction has its own lifecycle, but its lifecycle state depends on its container. If the container is destroyed, all fractions in it will also be destroyed. You can use the Fraction class to define a variety of layouts to enrich the user interface of your application.

Since:
3
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Fraction
    Provides lifecycle callbacks of a fraction.
    FractionAbility
    Base class for an Ability that wants to implement Fraction.
    FractionManager
    Provides methods for managing the lifecycle of a Fraction.
    FractionScheduler
    Provides methods for performing Fraction transactions.
